abstract: Six cases of childhood measles have been reported in Brooklyn over the last two weeks, contributing to a spike in measles cases this year.
snippet: Six cases of childhood measles have been reported in Brooklyn over the last two weeks, contributing to a spike in measles cases this year.
lead_paragraph: Six cases of childhood measles have been reported in Brooklyn over the last two weeks, the New York City health department said Friday, contributing to a spike in measles cases this year.

headline.main: Health Department Reports Spike in Measles Cases in Brooklyn
